Question: What is the time complexity of inserting into a min-heap?
Choices: A) O(1); B) O(log n); C) O(n); D) O(n log n)

Question: Which data structure uses LIFO (Last In, First Out)?
Choices: A) Queue; B) Stack; C) Heap; D) Graph

Question: What is the best case time complexity of quicksort?
Choices: A) O(n); B) O(n log n); C) O(n^2); D) O(log n)

Question: In a binary search tree, where are values greater than the root stored?
Choices: A) Left subtree; B) Right subtree; C) Root; D) Not applicable

Question: Which traversal method uses a queue data structure?
Choices: A) DFS; B) BFS; C) Inorder; D) Postorder

Question: Which of the following is a non-linear data structure?
Choices: A) Array; B) Linked List; C) Stack; D) Tree

Question: What is the average time complexity for searching in a hash table?
Choices: A) O(1); B) O(log n); C) O(n); D) O(n log n)

Question: Which sorting algorithm is the fastest in practice for large datasets?
Choices: A) Bubble Sort; B) Merge Sort; C) Quick Sort; D) Insertion Sort

Question: What is the output of a postorder traversal?
Choices: A) Left, Right, Root; B) Root, Left, Right; C) Right, Left, Root; D) Left, Root, Right

Question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array?
Choices: A) O(n); B) O(log n); C) O(1); D) O(n log n)

Question: Which of the following data structures is used in recursion?
Choices: A) Queue; B) Hash Map; C) Stack; D) Array

Question: What data structure is best suited for implementing BFS?
Choices: A) Stack; B) Queue; C) Tree; D) Graph

Question: What is a key property of a binary heap?
Choices: A) Balanced and Complete; B) Sorted; C) Unordered; D) Has siblings

Question: Which data structure provides constant-time lookup on average?
Choices: A) Linked List; B) Stack; C) Hash Table; D) Tree

Question: Which traversal of a binary search tree results in a sorted sequence?
Choices: A) Preorder; B) Inorder; C) Postorder; D) BFS
